1.name: Certified acts of terrorism not excluded / non-certified acts of terrorism not excluded
1.type: Terrorism Options Under the Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of 2002

2.name: Certified acts of terrorism not excluded / non-certified acts of terrorism arising from nuclear, biological, or chemical events excluded
2.type: Terrorism Options Under the Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of 2002

3.name: Certified acts of terrorism not excluded / non-certified acts of terrorism excluded, subject to limitations
3.type: Terrorism Options Under the Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of 2002

4a.name: Certified terrorism loss excludeda / non-certified acts of terrorism not excluded
4a.type: Terrorism Options Under the Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of 2002

5a.name: Certified terrorism loss excludeda / non-certified acts of terrorism arising from nuclear, biological, or chemical events excluded
5a.type: Terrorism Options Under the Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of 2002

6a.name: Certified terrorism loss excludeda / non-certified acts of terrorism excludeda
6a.type: Terrorism Options Under the Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of 2002

B.name: Terrorism is covered, but only when the total property damage for terrorism event is $25,000,000 or less

C.name: All terrorism events are covered, except those attributed to nuclear, biological, or chemical events
